passages.text: Welcome back. [[Why won't you buy my fish?|Explanation]][[Sell]][[Leave]]

links.name: Why won't you buy my fish?|Explanation
links.link: Why won't you buy my fish?|Explanation

passages.text: Plucking these riches from the sea takes a toll. By having the Church identify and catalog catches, we can repay the debt and ensure we don't take too greedily.[[Sell]] [[Leave]]
passages.name: Explanation

passages.text: I look forward to your next catch.
passages.name: Leave
